name: Level 1
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.
Go straight. No need to turn. You can reach in two steps.

name: Level 2
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.
Take a left turn and walk.

name: Level 3
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.
Go straight, take a right turn and walk to get the bamboo.

name: Level 4
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.

Go straight, take a right turn and walk to get the bamboo.

name: Level 6
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.
Dont take too many steps. You can do it in 5 steps. Take minimum turns.

name: Level 17
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots.
Open the box and enjoy the food.Walk to the Key.
Take it and walk again to get the bamboo. Do it in minimum steps.

name: Level 18
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots.
Open the box and enjoy the food.Walk to the Key.
Take it and walk again to get the bamboo. Do it in minimum steps.

name: Level 19
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots.
Open the box and enjoy the food.Go straight.
Take a left turn and get the key. Walk straight to get the bamboo.

name: Level 20
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots.
Open the box and enjoy the food.Go straight. Take a left turn and get the key.
Continue walking to get the bamboo. Do it with minimum no of turns.

name: Level 21
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots.
Open the box and enjoy the food.Walk to the Key.

name: Level 22
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots.Open the box
and enjoy the food.Walk to the Key.Take it and walk again
to get the bamboo. Do it in minimum steps and minimum turns.
( Only 2 turns required).

name: Level 23
subTitle:

name: Level 24
subTitle:

name: Level 25
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.Do it using
minimum steps.Go straight, take a right turn and walk to get the bamboo.
Use loop wherever it is walking more than one step..

name: Level 28
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
and enjoy the food.Take one step. Take a right turn and a step to take the key.
Now walk one more step,take a right turn, walk one more step to
open the box.

name: Level 29
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box

Do it using minimum no of steps.

name: Level 37
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.
But avoid stepping on the magma pool. Dont take too many steps. You can do it in 12 steps. Take minimum turns.

name: Level 38
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.
But avoid stepping on the magma pool. Dont take too many steps. You can do it in 12 steps. Use loop to do it in minimum turns.

name: Level 39
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.
But avoid stepping on the magma pool. Dont take too many steps. You can do it in 11 steps. Use loop to do it in minimum turns.

name: Level 40
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the bamboo shoots.
Click on Steps button for walk and Direction buttons for turn.
But avoid stepping on the magma pool. Dont take too many steps. You can do it in 10 steps using loops.

name: Level 41
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
and enjoy the food. But don't beware of the magma pool.
Dont take too many steps. You can do it in 16 steps with the help of loops.

name: Level 42
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
and enjoy the food. But don't step on the magma pool.
Do it using minimum no of steps. You can do it in 13 steps.

name: Level 43
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
and enjoy the food. But don't step on the magma pool.
Do it using minimum no of steps. You can do it in 19 steps.

name: Level 44
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the key first.
Take the key and walk again to the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
and enjoy the food. But don't step on the magma pool.
Do it using minimum no of steps. You can do it in 16 steps with the help of loops.

name: Level 45
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the first key.
Take the key and walk again to the second key. Use the keys to unlock the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
and enjoy the food.
You can do it in 12 steps with the help of loops.

name: Level 46
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the first key.
Take the key and walk again to the second key. Use the keys to unlock the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
and enjoy the food.
You can do it in 17 steps with the help of loops.

name: Level 47
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the all three keys in their order.
Use the keys to unlock the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
and enjoy the food.
You can do it in 15 steps with the help of loops.

name: Level 48
subTitle:
Help Bagu to walk and get the all three keys in their order.
Use the keys to unlock the locked bamboo shoots. Open the box
